page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: {Sports Clubs Cricket Club The Cricket Club was started in the early 1970's. Their ground is on the south side of the village.They play friendly matches only and these are played on Sundays. Quoit Club This club has been running for about 6 years.They practice on Wednesday evenings and Sunday Mornings. Darts club Throughout the Winter months there are darts matches every Tuesday and Friday evenings, and every Thursday for the ladies.They are played in the Star Inn. Pool Club Pool matches are played in the Star Inn on Sunday Evenings in the Winter months. .
